summary: This is an email from a US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) to the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG) providing an update on the Jeffrey Epstein case. It states that a judge approved proposed redactions to a document, confirms a filing time change, and notes Epstein's bail hearing is scheduled for 11:30 AM on July 18, 2019.

events.title: Epstein Bail Hearing
events.description: Bail hearing for Jeffrey Epstein scheduled for 11:30 AM.

events.title: Court Filing of Redacted Document
events.description: The US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York files a final, redacted version of a document at 11:00 AM, as approved by a judge.

keyFacts: A judge approved redactions proposed by the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) to a document related to the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The final, redacted version of the document was filed at 11:00 AM on July 18, 2019, after the judge changed the time from 10:00 AM.
Jeffrey Epstein's bail hearing was scheduled for 11:30 AM on July 18, 2019.
The communication is an internal email update from the USANYS to the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG).
